casebody.data:
QUANTMEYER, Respondent, v. J. H. MOHLMAN CO., Appellant. (City Court ot New York.

General Term.

June 29, 1899.) Action by August Quantmeyer against the J. H. Mohlman Company. There was a judgment for plaintiff, and defendant appeals. Affirmed. PER CURIAM.

Judgment and order appealed from affirmed, with costs and disbursements.
